author: Staff Reporter
text:
City Police Commissioner Sumit Sharan has placed Special Sub-Inspector Kanagaraj under suspension for failing to attend training programme here recently.

Personnel who served 25 years in the police department were promoted as SSI and training would be given to them at the training institute in Dharmapuri.

After selection, they would be posted as Sub-Inspector.

A total of 125 personnel from Salem, Dharmapuri, Namakkal and Krishnagiri districts were currently provided training in Dharmapuri.

Kanagaraj was one among the 28 personnel from the Salem City police undergoing training.

However, a few days ago Kanagaraj did not attend the training and was found in an inebriated condition in his room. Principal of the training institute informed Mr. Sharan, who placed him under suspension.
title: SSI suspended for failing to attend training
